name: Metal Slug - Defenders of Earth
description:
Metal Slug: Defenders of Earth is a 2D Action Shooter game created using Construct 2. The game uses sprites from Metal Slug and Castlevania (Dracula). This was made for a student portfolio piece that showcases 2D gameplay and mechanics.

Music is from "Contra meets Metal" by 331Erock and "CONTRA Twin Guitar Metal Medley ft. Dr. Pez" by Ferdk. 
You can find their YouTube videos here:
Contra Meets Metal by 331Erock.
CONTRA Twin Guitar Metal Medley by Ferdk.
